name: Huong Sen Hotel 3
address: Hoa Binh Park, Tu Liem District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Nestled in the heart of Tu Liem District, Huong Sen Hotel 3 is an ideal spot from which to discover Hanoi. From here, guests can enjoy easy access to all that the lively city has to offer. With its convenient location, the hotel offers easy access to the city's must-see destinations.

Huong Sen Hotel 3 also offers many facilities to enrich your stay in Hanoi. To name a few of the hotel's facilities, there are free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, valet parking, tours.

The ambiance of Huong Sen Hotel 3 is reflected in every guestroom. television LCD/plasma screen, air conditioning, mini bar, fan, satellite/cable TV are just some of the facilities that can be found throughout the property. Besides, the hotel's host of recreational offerings ensures you have plenty to do during your stay. Huong Sen Hotel 3 is a smart choice for travelers to Hanoi, offering a relaxed and hassle-free stay every time.
